verses.roman:
śloka kari' eka tāla-patrete likhiyā
āpana vāsāra cāle rākhila guñjiyā

synonyms: śloka kari'-composing the verse; eka—one; tāla-patrete—on a palm leaf; likhiyā—writing; āpana—his own; vāsāra—of the residence; cāle—on the roof; rākhila—kept; guñjiyā—pushing.
translation: After composing this verse, Rūpa Gosvāmī wrote it on a palm leaf and put it on the roof of the thatched house in which he was living.
